NAME: First Aid
DESCRIPTION: Perform an improvised healing on yourself.

NAME: Small Fireball
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of fire damage to an enemy.

NAME: Rushed Strike
DESCRIPTION: Perform a rushed attack on an enemy, lowers your attack.

NAME: Bloodstealer
DESCRIPTION: Drain health from your enemy's blood.

NAME: Disarm
DESCRIPTION: Deal small physical damage to an enemy and lowers their attack.

NAME: Shadow Strike
DESCRIPTION: Deal some physical damage to an enemy. Does not skip your turn but lowers your defense.

NAME: Sharpen Knives
DESCRIPTION: Sharpen your knives, raising your attack, critical hit chance and critical damage.

NAME: Hurricane Blades
DESCRIPTION: Deal great physical wind damage to an enemy

NAME: Quickflame
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of fire damage to an enemy. Does not skip the turn.

NAME: Ice Bolt
DESCRIPTION: Deal ice damage to an enemy.

NAME: Mana barrier
DESCRIPTION: Spend 30% of your mana to buff your physical and magical defense.

NAME: Meditate
DESCRIPTION: Recover some amount of MP.

NAME: Thunder Spear
DESCRIPTION: Deal both physical and magical thunder damage to an enemy.

NAME: Shielded Strike
DESCRIPTION: Deal small physical damage invoking a shield, raising your physical defense.

NAME: Fire Fist
DESCRIPTION: Deal physical fire damage to an enemy.

NAME: Intimidate
DESCRIPTION: Intimidate the enemy and lowers their attack.

NAME: Fortify
DESCRIPTION: Fortify yourself and raise your defense.

NAME: Whirlwind
DESCRIPTION: Deal a small amount of wind damage to an enemy.

NAME: Ignis Ardere
DESCRIPTION: Conjure severe fire magic damage.

NAME: Hyperbeam
DESCRIPTION: Perform a highly damage blow, but debuffs yourself.

NAME: Bio
DESCRIPTION: Lowers enemy defense.
